content: नीच {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [निकृष्टतमीं शोभां चिनोति, चि-ड <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Low, short, small, little, dwarfish. {@--2@} Situated below, being in a low position; <ls>Bg. 6. 11</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 198</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 131.</ls> {@--3@} Lowered, deep (as a voice). {@--4@} Low, mean, base, vile, worst; प्रारभ्यते न खलु विघ्नभयेन नीचैः <ls>Bh. 2. 27</ls>; नीचस्य गोचरगतैः सुखमास्यते कैः <ls n="Bh. 2.">59</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 48.</ls> {@--5@} Worthless, insignificant. --चा An excellent cow. --चं The lowest point of a planet.
